verses.roman:
tāṅhāi prakaṭa kaila vaikuṇṭha nija-dhāma
śeṣa-śayana-jale karila viśrāma

synonyms: tāṅhāi—there; prakaṭa—manifestation; kaila—did; vaikuṇṭha—the spiritual world; nija-dhāma—His own abode; śeṣa—of Lord Śeṣa; śayana—on the bed; jale—on the water; karila—did; viśrāma—rest.
translation: There He manifested Vaikuṇṭha as His own abode and rested in the waters on the bed of Lord Śeṣa.
